section.title: sale types creating new Sale Type
section.para: Sale Types are used to distinguish one kind of sale from another, for reporting purposes. They also impact sales accounting, as they appear as one of the Account Assignment options on the Sales Assignments screen. To create a new Sale Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Sale Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Sale Type.
Enter a description to further identify the Sale Type.
Select to indicate the Sale Type is active. If not selected, the Sale Type will be considered inactive.
Select if you want the Sale Type to be the default Sale Type when entering Sales Orders.
